title: Who Are the Actual Teams to Beat? | The Ringer NFL Show (Ep. 369)
description:
The Rams, Saints, and Patriots no longer look like juggernauts, so who does? (0:30) Cancel the Pro Bowl and send Larry Fitzgerald to the Patriots on this week's Take Shop (17:30), plus the three biggest games of the week, the Browns' coaching situation, and personal Pro Bowlers (26:30).
Hosts: Robert Mays and Kevin Clark

      
Learn more about your ad choices. Visit podcastchoices.com/adchoices
